ingredients: 4 medium mangos - peeled, seeded, and cubed,   +   1/4 cup fresh lime juice, 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, 1 tablespoon red pepper flakes, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, 2 tablespoons chopped shallots,   salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 5g 7%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Sodium 4mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 26g 9%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 21g, Protein 1g, Vitamin C 43mg 215%, Calcium 19mg 1%, Iron 0mg 2%, Potassium 274mg 6%
